-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s0, c3)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clss, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c3)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Property of being a Noetherian left module with finite generation expanded in terms of spans. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
